text:
Liga
Bar√ßa: Krkic believes to have succeeded with the Blaugrana
FC Barcelona's great hope, Bojan Krkic failed to win at the Blaugrana. However, he finds his successful passage in the Catalan club.
03 Nov 2019, 08:40 by Hugo Deloraine



Bojan Krkic, 29, was unable to win at Bar√ßa when he was judged as the great hope of home blaugrana at 17 years. He then played in top clubs such as AS Roma, Ajax Amsterdam or AC Milan. Today at Impact Montreal, he spoke about his passage in the Catalan club at the microphone of Mundo Deportivo.




"I think I triumphed at Bar√ßa"




Bojan + 21 üì∑Credit Photo - Icon Sport

"I think I have triumphed at Bar√ßa, I do not know how many players can claim to have scored 40 goals in Bar√ßa A team, that they have played four seasons there while it is a world class team with all the pressure that I was 16-17 years old, I was very young, experienced on and off the field, of course I should have scored twice more goals or be closer to this tag (that of great hope, ed) I was stuck in the first day but it was for me a success.
